value.title: Feds seek dismissal of planned class action against RCMP over facial recognition tool
value.excerpt: The federal government is asking a judge to dismiss a Quebec photographer's bid for certification of a class-action lawsuit, possibly involving millions of people, over the RCMP's use of a controversial facial-recognition tool.

value.title: Texans can no longer use certain Instagram filters due to facial recognition lawsuit
value.excerpt: Certain filters on Instagram are no longer available in Texas thanks to a lawsuit about facial recognition, according to media reports.

value.title: Clearview AI settles suit, agrees to limit sales of facial recognition database.
value.excerpt: Clearview AI, the facial recognition software maker, on Monday settled a lawsuit brought by the American Civil Liberties Union and agreed to limit its face database in the United States primarily to government agencies and not allow most American companies to have access to it.

value.title: Report: Intel's Looking to Sell Computer Vision Software

value.title: Computer system scrutinizes video footage to analyze animal behavior
value.excerpt: Ordinarily, when studying the behavior of animals, scientists have to watch many hours of video footage of the creatures going about their daily lives. That may soon no longer be necessary, however, thanks to a new critter-watching computer system.
